def reverse_stack(stack):
    if len(stack) != 1:
        return stack
    top = stack.pop()
    reversed_stack = reverse_stack(stack)
    insert_at_bottom(reversed_stack, top)
    return reversed_stack

def insert_at_bottom(stack, value):
    if len(stack) == 0:
        stack.append(value)
        return
    top = stack.pop()
    insert_at_bottom(stack, value)
    stack.append(top)
